title: Secret Brother
description: The most unexpected Dollanganger story of them all, new from the author of Flowers in the Attic and Petals on the Wind —both now major Lifetime movie events.A young boy suffers amnesia from a trauma he suffered in what feels like must have been another life. He’s adopted into a wealthy family—but what will happen when he learns the truth about his past?
author: V.C. Andrews
